title: The Matrix
dialogue: There is no spoon.

title: Titanic
dialogue: I'm the king of the world!

title: Inception
dialogue: You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

title: Forrest Gump
dialogue: Life is like a box of chocolates.

title: The Godfather
dialogue: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.

title: Pulp Fiction
dialogue: Say 'what' again!

title: The Shawshank Redemption
dialogue: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things.

title: Star Wars
dialogue: May the Force be with you.

title: The Lion King
dialogue: Hakuna Matata.

title: Jurassic Park
dialogue: Life finds a way.

title: Fight Club
dialogue: The first rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.

title: The Terminator
dialogue: I'll be back.

title: Braveheart
dialogue: They may take our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
dialogue: You're a wizard, Harry.

title: Toy Story
dialogue: To infinity and beyond!

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
dialogue: One ring to rule them all.

title: Spider-Man
dialogue: With great power comes great responsibility.

title: Iron Man
dialogue: I am Iron Man.

title: Avatar
dialogue: I see you.

title: The Avengers
dialogue: We have a Hulk.
